scalar:array.comment:
/** * Smarty capitalize modifier plugin * * Type: modifier
* Name: capitalize
* Purpose: capitalize words in the string * * {@internal {$string|capitalize:true:true} is the fastest option for MBString enabled systems }} * * @param string $string string to capitalize * @param boolean $uc_digits also capitalize "x123" to "X123" * @param boolean $lc_rest capitalize first letters, lowercase all following letters "aAa" to "Aaa" * @return string capitalized string * @author Monte Ohrt * @author Rodney Rehm */

/** * Smarty capitalize modifier plugin * * Type: modifier
* Name: capitalize
* Purpose: capitalize words in the string * * {@internal {$string|capitalize:true:true} is the fastest option for MBString enabled systems }} * * @param string $string string to capitalize * @param boolean $uc_digits also capitalize "x123" to "X123" * @param boolean $lc_rest capitalize first letters, lowercase all following letters "aAa" to "Aaa" * @return string capitalized string * @author Monte Ohrt * @author Rodney Rehm */
